title: Polki & Emerald Chandbali Jhumka - An Timeless Elegance
materials: Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster. Polki diamonds used are of high clarity with minimal inclusions for optimal brilliance.
features: Classic Chandbali design with a central oval-cut Emerald surrounded by a halo of Polki diamonds. The earrings feature an intricate openwork design meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans, creating a sense of depth and dimension. The Jhumka is adorned with additional polki diamonds, adding to its traditional charm.
colors: Predominantly gold with the vibrant green of the Emerald and the shimmering white of the Polki diamonds. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich
occasions: and other special occasions. A statement piece for any traditional South Indian attire like silk sarees and lehengas. Also suitable for modern fusion outfits seeking a touch of tradition.
description: This Chandbali Jhumka is a true heirloom piece, crafted with the finest materials and timeless design. The Polki diamonds, with their unique uncut charm, lend an antique yet sophisticated feel. The natural emerald adds a touch of luxury and is believed to bring prosperity. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, even for extended periods. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a lasting shine.
